item.title: Spokesperson Wanted for Short Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Need to hire 5-10 Freelancers

I'm looking for men and women (35 years and older) who have some experience in creating videos. Those who also have experience with short, scripted product promotions are preferred but not required.

These videos may be taken with a camera or a smartphone.  I'd also like to see an example of your work.

If you fit this description, I'd love to hear from you!
